mapper.sql: id, company_name, regist_item_id, qichacha_key_no, config_id, state, creater, created_time, updater, updated_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from company_query_detail
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

company_name,
regist_item_id,
qichacha_key_no,
config_id,
state,
creater,
created_time,
updater,
updated_time,

mapper.update:
update company_query_detail
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_name = #{record.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regist_item_id = #{record.registItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qichacha_key_no = #{record.qichachaKeyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
config_id = #{record.configId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creater = #{record.creater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_time = #{record.createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updater = #{record.updater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updated_time = #{record.updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update company_query_detail set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_name = #{record.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regist_item_id = #{record.registItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qichacha_key_no = #{record.qichachaKeyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, config_id = #{record.configId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creater = #{record.creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{record.createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{record.updater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_time = #{record.updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update company_query_detail
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regist_item_id = #{registItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qichacha_key_no = #{qichachaKeyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
config_id = #{configId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updater = #{updater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update company_query_detail set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regist_item_id = #{registItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qichacha_key_no = #{qichachaKeyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, config_id = #{configId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select key_no AS keyNo, COUNT(1) as countNum FROM company_query_qichacha_judgement WHERE key_no IN (SELECT qichacha_key_no FROM company_query_detail WHERE config_id = #{configId}) group by key_no
select key_no AS keyNo, COUNT(1) as countNum FROM company_query_qichacha_patent WHERE key_no IN (SELECT qichacha_key_no FROM company_query_detail WHERE config_id = #{configId}) group by key_no

select regist_item_id AS registItemId, COUNT(1) as countNum FROM company_query_monitor_company WHERE regist_item_id IN (SELECT regist_item_id FROM company_query_detail WHERE config_id = #{configId}) group by regist_item_id

select regist_item_id AS registItemId, COUNT(1) as countNum FROM company_query_pollution_discharge_license WHERE regist_item_id IN (SELECT regist_item_id FROM company_query_detail WHERE config_id = #{configId}) group by regist_item_id

select industry AS name, COUNT(1) as nameValue FROM company_query_qichacha_company_base WHERE key_no IN (SELECT qichacha_key_no FROM company_query_detail WHERE config_id = #{configId}) group by industry

select province AS name, COUNT(1) as nameValue FROM company_query_qichacha_company_base WHERE key_no IN (SELECT qichacha_key_no FROM company_query_detail WHERE config_id = #{configId}) group by province

select season, sum(fine) AS fineSum, sum(revoked) AS revokedSum, sum(confiscate) AS confiscateSum, sum(detention) AS detentionSum, sum(production) AS productionSum, sum(instruct) AS instructSum FROM ai_ipe WHERE regist_item_id IN (SELECT regist_item_id FROM company_query_detail WHERE config_id = #{configId}) group by season
